channel.title: urban planning on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in urban planning on ERIC WANG

item.title: @MINISTRY OF ENVIRONMENT - How to urban plan with data science ?
item.description: At the ministry of Environment and more specially at the local administration of Val d'Oise department, I learn to manage and to tackle local housing policy

item.title: @POPUPURBAIN - Sephora is taking Belleville, does it mean the end of it ?
item.description: Web article written during 2015 for a consulting office called pop-up urbain specialised in urbain foresight and social-media.

item.title: @MAYOR OF PARIS - How do we access water in Paris ?
item.description: Feasibility study for water access in Paris to quantify the correct need. The townhall of paris is working to decrease the feeling of heat (cf. urbain heat island phenomena).

item.title: @SNCF - How to size new line regarding Paris' evolution in 2030 ?
item.description: Internship made at SNCF in collaboration with l'Institut de la Région Île-de-France regarding the impact of 2 new lines of metro, today and in 2030.
